title: Whoops something broke
body:
Hey guys, after new LOL patch 6.20 , I can't play cause bugsplat !!!

It Says Whoops something broke before the game begins 

Please Someone help me !!!

replies.body: Hi ! I have the same problem. I don't know why but when I try to enter into a game this message appears!! And I can't play for 2 days... Thank's to try to help me..

Bugsplats are typically caused by weird interactions with problematic system drivers or hardware problems. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as it covers the most frequent solutions for this issue.

Let me know if those steps worked for you or not.
